description:
Pain is keeping you tense and anxious while you are healing from illness or injury - and this stress actually interferes with the healing.

This technique is highly effective if you are healing from an illness or injury and you need to relieve pain. It can be done any time, even in a public place, and others will not be aware you are doing it. It can also help you release the anxiety and frustration associated with pain, to give your body a greater ability to heal much more quickly.

The 7 benefits of the 7 minute classes

1. The techniques are EASY & VERY QUICK to learn and beneficial for everyone.

2. Classes are only 7 minutes and you can do them anywhere, anytime.

3. It’s a new way to physically relax your body, & calm your mind to increase happiness.

4. Many of the breaths classes can be done in public – when YOU need them most!

5. These NEW techniques gives you the tools to cope with everyday stresses.

6. The breaths classes really work – they do what they say, and you will feel instant relief!

7. You will feel in control of your body and mind & the more you use the tool the better it works.

You will almost instantly feel calm, relaxed and in control of your emotions, and your thinking will become clear and sharp once again & the pain will receed. Includes:

● ImmediatelyFully Guided Video with extra setup tips

● Fully Guided Audio with extra setup tips

● Guided Audio that you can put on repeat for a deeper experience

● Printable PDF’s with set up tips and extra information that will help you get the most out

of your new skill

This tool is excellent to ease anxiety and stress due to pain, and to manage pain during healing from illness or injury.

● No one will be aware you are doing this technique

● Works quickly to ease the emotional and physical symptoms of pain

● Improves your mindset, to promote healing
title: Pain & Healing - 7 Minute relief for Busy people, in public
